content: God’s Punishments Have Not Reformed Israel
Who say to your husbands, “Bring  let us drink!”
The Lord  has sworn by His holiness:
“Behold, the days shall come upon you
When He will take you away with fishhooks,
Each one straight ahead of her,
And you will be cast into Harmon,”
“Also I gave you cleanness of teeth in all your cities,
And lack of bread in all your places;
Yet you have not returned to Me,”
